original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The National Fuel Pass QR System allocated fuel quotas have been increased with effect from midnight on Tuesday (30).
Other three-wheelers and motorbikes will receive 14 liters per week.
The Ministry of Power and Energy says the quota for buses was increased from 60 liters to 125 liters from midnight on Tuesday (30).
Sri Lanka will be a fully developed country by 2048; economic growth will be based on four pillars – President
NO fuel shortage, says Minister; CPC to take action against dealers who failed to maintain stocks
Collective of opposition parties appoint several committees to study proposed bills
